Salman Khan Has The Funniest Message For Fans, Says Only SRK Fans Watch His Films On Torrent!
Salman Khan Has The Funniest Message For Fans, Says Only SRK Fans Watch His Films On Torrent!
Salman Khan is currently attending the Saudi Film Festival. During an interaction with all his fans, he was in a happy mood and answered all the questions! When someone asked him who is favorite actress from the industry is, he chose Katrina Kaif, who is also his co-star in his upcoming film Bharat.
Agencies
When he was asked to send across a special message for his fans, he had an epic response. He said,
Colors
"I really appreciate that, thank you very much. I really appreciate the fans that go to the cinema and watch the movies; those are the fans that I really, really like. The ones who watch it on Torrent and Pirated DVDs, they’re not my fans; they’re Shah Rukh Khan’s fans!”.-he chuckled.

Well, there is a long history behind Salman and Shah Rukh Khan's friendship.
Colors
There have been several rumors of their animosity but things have been more than cordial between the two!
title: Salman Khan Has The Funniest Message For Fans, Says Only SRK Fans Watch His Films On Torrent!
